org.apache.sshd.common.util.buffer

Class ByteArrayBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sshd.common.util.buffer.Buffer
      • org.apache.sshd.common.util.buffer.ByteArrayBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Readable

    public final class ByteArrayBuffer
extends Buffer
    Provides an implementation of Buffer using a backing byte array
    Author:
    Apache MINA SSHD Project

      • ensureCapacity

        public void ensureCapacity(int capacity,
                           Int2IntFunction growthFactor)
        Specified by:
        ensureCapacity in class Buffer
        Parameters:
        capacity - The requires capacity
        growthFactor - An Int2IntFunction that is invoked if the current capacity is insufficient. The argument is the minimum required new data length, the function result should be the effective new data length to be allocated - if less than minimum then an exception is thrown
